column1: Figure 3: Mobile phones and smartphones are by far the most popular devices to access the internet on the go
Devices used to access the internet on the go within the last three months, Great Britain, 2019

column2:
1. Base: adults (aged 16 years and over) in Great Britain. 
2. "On the go" refers to accessing the internet away from home or work.
